mapper.insert: insert into pop_db (pop_idx, a_idx, pop_tle, pop_con, pop_pic, pop_rdat, pop_link, pop_act, pop_etc) values (#{pop_idx}, #{a_idx}, #{pop_tle}, #{pop_con}, #{pop_pic}, now(), #{pop_link}, "0", #{pop_etc})
mapper.select: select * from pop_db order by pop_idx desc
mapper.update: update pop_db set pop_tle=#{pop_tle}, pop_con=#{pop_con}, pop_pic=#{pop_pic}, pop_link=#{pop_link}, pop_act=#{pop_act}, pop_etc=#{pop_etc} where pop_idx=#{pop_idx}
update pop_db set pop_odat=now(), pop_act="1", a_idx=#{a_idx} where pop_idx=#{pop_idx}
